chunks.text_preview: Uruga 31mm Leather - Diamonds. The Uruga 31mm Leather model was specifically designed for ladies. It is an elegant version of the 42mm model with highly polished clamps. In alternance to the indexes, the dial is decorated with 6 genuine diamonds. The case is fitted with 36 diamonds of 1.3mm. 0.32 ct
